title: The Weeping Wall
description: The 'Shield-Wall' in the North Ward is weeping a black, oily liquid. It's weakening the stone and smells of decay.

turns.narrative: The wall is cold, despite the sun. Large, dark streaks run down the mortar like tears. The oil feels warm to the touch and stains your skin purple.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You recognize the flavor of 'Void-Gall'. (+1 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You pull away a layer of blackened, porous stone. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A low moan vibrates through the foundation of the wall.

turns.narrative: The moaning is coming from inside the wall. Someone—or something—is trapped within the stonework.
turns.choice_a: Press your ear to the stone (Perc DC 12)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You hear a muffled plea for help in an ancient tongue. (+1 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You crack the outer shell, revealing a hollow cavity. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The oil begins to flow faster, turning into a torrent that threatens to wash you off the ledge.

turns.narrative: The torrent is slippery and freezing. You see a pair of pale, translucent hands reaching out from the crack.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You pull at the weight, feeling a sudden resistance. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The oil recoils, allowing you to see inside. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: You've uncovered a 'Wall-Steward'—an entity formed of stone and spirit, now corrupted by the rot.

turns.narrative: The Steward is half-merged with the granite. Its eyes are spheres of black oil. It begs for the 'Song of Silence'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You soothe the spirit's pain. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: End its misery to free the wall
turns.consequence_b: Success: You strike the core, releasing the spirit. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The stone around the breach begins to crumble. A section of the wall is about to collapse.

turns.narrative: Blocks of granite are sliding out of place. The oil is acting as a lubricant, making the structure unstable.
turns.choice_a: Shore up the wall with wooden beams (Repair DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You provide temporary stability. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Freeze the oil into a solid binding
turns.consequence_b: Success: You use the rot against itself to hold the blocks. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A 'Grave-Slug'—a massive, oily invertebrate—crawls out from the foundation.

turns.narrative: The slug is the source of the Gall. It's the size of a wagon and leaves a trail of boiling sludge.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The slug sizzles and shrinks. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The creature dissolves into a puddle of brine. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The wall stops moaning. The oil begins to dry into a brittle, black crust.

turns.narrative: The structural integrity is still compromised. You need to perform a permanent fix before the next storm.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You bind the stones back together. (+1 Rep with Masons)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The wall is stronger than before. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Steward from the North Ward arrives, looking at the damage with a grim expression.

turns.narrative: The Steward recognizes the Grave-Slug as a 'Sleeper Agent'—something planted decades ago.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You learn about the 'Era of the Gall-Wars'. (+1 Lore)
turns.choice_b: Check other sections of the wall
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find no other infestations. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: Work crews arrive to finish the masonry. You are free to go.

turns.narrative: Your gear is ruined by the oil. The Steward offers to have it cleaned or replaced.
turns.choice_a: Ask for 'Steward's Mail' as a replacement
turns.consequence_a: Success: You receive a rare piece of stone-bonded armor. (+1 Gear)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You are paid handsomely. (+700 Gold)
turns.convergence: The North Ward is safe for now.

turns.narrative: The wall is dry, the black streaks now looking like ancient, honorable scars. You sit by the battlements as the first rain begins to fall.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You feel a profound sense of accomplishment. (+20 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You are fully refreshed. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Weeping Wall was a ticking time bomb of Void-Gall. The spirit of the wall is freed, and the stones are silent once more.

risk_matrix.penalty: Wall breach. -2 Settlement Defense and a sector of the town is evacuated.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: North-Ward Steward reports structural anomaly on Shield-Wall
